Functions
IsDegenerate
static bool IsDegenerate(
CGeomVertex* 
v0,
CGeomVertex* 
v1,
CGeomVertex* 
v2
)

Determines if the specified triangle is degenerate (i.e. area == 0)

Parameters
v0
CGeomVertex*

Position of vertex 1

v1
CGeomVertex*

Position of vertex 2

v2
CGeomVertex*

Position of vertex 3

Returns

True if triangle is degenerate. False otherwise.

std::
vector<CGeomVertex> 
&
verts,
IShaderInfo* 
pShaderInfo,
std::
vector<int>& 
vertexReferenced,
MeshData* 
pMeshData
)

Creates a vertex buffer using the specified vertex list.

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

Graphics device

verts
std::vector<CGeomVertex>&

list of vertices

pShaderInfo
IShaderInfo*

Information about the shader

vertexReferenced
std::vector<int>&

List indicating which vertices were referenced by the face list

MeshData

place to store created vertex buffer

BuildReferencedVertexList
static void BuildReferencedVertexList(
std::
vector<CGeomFace> 
&
faces,
std::
vector<CGeomVertex> 
&
verts,
std::
vector<int>& 
vertexReferenced
)

Determines which vertices are part of non-degenerate faces. This function is used to prune out degenerate faces when building the vertex/index buffers.

Parameters
faces
std::vector<CGeomFace>&

list of faces

verts
std::vector<CGeomVertex>&

list of vertices

vertexReferenced
std::vector<int>&

List indicating which vertices were referenced by the face list

CreateDepthGridMesh
CRefObj<IRenderSubMesh> CreateDepthGridMesh(
IRenderer* 
pRenderer,
uint32_t 
width,
uint32_t 
height,
IShader* 
pShader
)

Creates a render submesh that is a grid. This is used for rendering a depth map as a mesh.

Parameters
pRenderer
IRenderer*

Renderer

width
uint32_t

width of depth map

height
uint32_t

height of depth map

pShader
IShader*

shader

Returns

Returns the new render submesh
